channel.title: Something interesting to think about
channel.description:
Think about this, where did all this gold come from? I mean, people have billions of coins, that just appeared out of nowhere. I really don't see any way that that much gold can come from anywhere. So where did it come from?
Discuss.

item.title: Something interesting to think about
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

[quote=“n10si t, post:20, topic:444264”][quote author=t4 link=topic=546955.msg4011041#msg4011041 date=1339208361]
general stores
[/quote]

??? when was the last time anyone with more than 500k used a general store?[/quote]
Few months ago.

Read full topic

item.description:

Think about this, where did all this gold come from? I mean, people have billions of coins, that just appeared out of nowhere. I really don’t see any way that that much gold can come from anywhere. So where did it come from?

Discuss.

CoinShare
G.E
Selling to NPC

[/quote]S
Shouldn’t ever say GE on this topic. Because they use money that was already in the game.[/quote]

Didn’t even mean to put it there,

Read full topic

item.title: Something interesting to think about
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

[quote=“runescape sucks, post:1, topic:444264”]Think about this, where did all this gold come from? I mean, people have billions of coins, that just appeared out of nowhere. I really don’t see any way that that much gold can come from anywhere. So where did it come from?

Discuss.[/quote]
tons of bots killing tons of npcs spawned tons of items which were sold to tons of players in return for tons of gold

As for the initial source of gold, im not sure. Im sure general store prices were higher earlier in the game and alching stuff was much more profitable.

Read full topic

item.title: Something interesting to think about
item.dc:creator: @Krim Krim
item.description:
@Krim wrote:

n10si t:

all the money, the “inflation” if you will, came from merchanters. not just your every day people, but the prime time people. the people who have 100s upon 100s of party hats, and buy for 1.8b, sell for 2.5b, etc. It just generated so much money, and eventually it has started to trickle down

Okay, but ask yourself this: How did that gold get in the game? It didn’t appear out of no where.

Read full topic

item.title: Something interesting to think about
item.dc:creator: @Krim Krim
item.description:
@Krim wrote:

Think closely my friend. There are tons of ways people can get cash, but most of those ways are too slow, since the economy is mostly item based, rather than gold based. The only reason there is a crap load of gold in the game is because people usually alch to get 99 Magic. Everyday, about 2B GP enters the game through alching.

Read full topic

item.title: Something interesting to think about
item.dc:creator: @runescape_sucks runescape sucks
item.description:
@runescape_sucks wrote:

But even still, that’s alot of gold to accumulate from just minigames. I mean even with that, people walk around with stacks of gold coins, like somone on youtube showed off 6 stacks of max cash in the GE, that’s alot just from minigames, and other gold-distributing games

I never knew pest control gave coins.
[/quote]I think it gives like 1k coins per game.[/quote]
combat level * 10
